name: Valerij
summary: I am passionate about programming at all and especially about web programming. I am a skilled back-end developer with some experience in front-end. I am meticulous about cleanliness of the code. I am a quick learner and a team worker that gets the job done. Dreaming about project in field of music to combine both my most biggest interests.

facts.name: Main stack
facts.value: ASP.NET Core web app with docker support

services.summary: As a programmer, I offer high quality website development services in any field, as a solo programmer or in a team.

skills.summary: I am a quick learner and specialize in multitude of technologies required for Web Application Development

experiences.description: I took part in developing of three web applications: google website, other cool site for real estate. One of them created as ASP.NET Core web API with SPA front-end on the React.js, other one - monolith ASP.NET Core apps with Razor pages and Vue.js front-end.
